snippet.title: Swift: Firebase 3 - How to Send Messages (Ep 8)
snippet.description:
In this episode, we'll go over how to send messages to our Firebase database system.  But first we'll need to construct the UI that allows us to enter some text.  In addition, we'll create a send button that handles the action placing a message node into Firebase.  Very interesting stuff, hope you guys enjoy.

Previous Episode 7:
https://youtu.be/69LooiLYjQo

All episodes for Firebase 3 series:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JEfHqwjBV0XFb9qx9cGXwkq

Completed Source Code
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/firebase-chat-messenger
